exercises.name: Posture Correction
steps: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart
Slowly roll your shoulders back and down
Gently tuck your chin in
Hold this position for 10 seconds
Relax and repeat 5 times

exercises.name: Neck Relief
steps: Sit upright with your shoulders relaxed
Gently tilt your right ear toward your right shoulder
Hold for 15-30 seconds, feeling the stretch on the left side
Return to center and repeat on the left side
Do 3 repetitions on each side

exercises.name: Lower Back Stretch
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor
Cross your right leg over your left thigh
Gently pull your left thigh toward your chest
Hold for 30 seconds and feel the stretch in your lower back
Switch sides and repeat 3 times per side

exercises.name: Shoulder Mobility
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Extend your arms to the sides at shoulder height
Rotate your arms in small circles forward for 30 seconds
Rotate your arms in small circles backward for 30 seconds
Repeat 2 more times in each direction

exercises.name: Desk Stretches
steps: While seated, extend your arms overhead and reach as high as possible
Interlace your fingers and turn palms upward
Hold for 15 seconds while breathing deeply
Release and roll shoulders backward 5 times
Repeat sequence 3 times
